name: Intro
_source: speak;Reisen;*huff* *puff*{c:wait;200}{tgm} Master! It's the shrine maiden - {c:wait;300}she's heading this way!;no_talk
speak;Eirin;Hmm, this is certainly not ideal. Right when I was on the verge of a breakthrough...
speak;Reisen;Your patients...{c:wait;200} also escaped during the skirmish. With all due respect, Master,|aren't you concerned?
speak;Eirin;...{c:wait;100}{tgm}A minor miscalculation, but thankfully, the error is negligible.;no_talk
speak;Eirin;Besides, with the exception of those two fairies, all the other patients were catatonic|upon arrival. I doubt they will do much harm.
speak;Reisen;That's reassuring, but what about the code red heading for us right now?
speak;Eirin;I'm currently looking at the solution.
speak;Reisen;N-no, I heard you right. But you want ME to fight her?

speak;Eirin;You are capable enough, no? To reassure you, I've run the numbers as well.|You have a 99.7% chance of purchasing me enough time to carry out my business...|within three standard deviations, of course.
speak;Reisen;I can't tell if you are praising or insulting me.
speak;Reisen;Wait, so you aren't going to fight then?
speak;Eirin;No, I have much more... {c:wait;100}urgent business to attend to. Do not worry, it will not take long.|I believe you can manage. Good luck, Udongein.
speak;Reisen;*sigh*...{c:wait;200} {tgm}Just my luck, but I can't help it, I guess. Alright...{c:wait;300};no_talk
speak;Marisa;Man, I just felt a chill in the room.
speak;Reimu;It's almost like something absolutely annoying is about to happen.
speak;Marisa;Come on, Reimu. You know what they say about jinxes, right?
speak;Reimu;That you can split disposable chopsticks perfectly with them?
speak;Marisa;What kind of jinx is that?
speak;Kasen;I concur with Marisa. We should not be tempting fate right now.
speak;Reimu;Well, with a certain vampire here, we can do it as much as we want! Who's gonna stop-
speak;Marisa;...{c:wait;300}{tgm}And superstition marches on. Guess we're doing this thing again.|Least it ain't me this time!;no_talk
speak;Reimu;I don't see that pharmacist around here...that's weird.
speak;;This map's clear bonus is 375 Bonus EXP, with a decrease of 75 BExp per turn you take over 15 turns!;;;hint
